translation:
Reserved

Most Illustrious Sir

For the good of the service of the State, it is fitting to inform that the gentlemen Prados, officers of the distinguished Division under the command of Your Lordship's husband Manuel José Ferreira, have attempted the seduction of soldiers, whom they say assert to people residing here.

God preserve Your Lordship Secretary of State for the Affairs of Justice in Caçapava, February 28, 1839. Domingos José de Almeida Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira, Commander of the Right Division.
